context: Zebra Technologies is a global leader providing innovative solutions for enterprise asset intelligence, mobile computing, and automatic identification. Serves healthcare, retail, manufacturing, and transportation industries. Market capitalization between $10-200 billion places ZBRA in large cap category. Company specializes in mobile computers, barcode scanners, RFID readers, specialty printers, real-time location systems, and software solutions.
